summary: This bill, the Restoring the First Amendment and Right to Peaceful Civil Disobedience Act of 2025 (S. 223), introduced in the U.S. Senate in January 2025, aims to amend Title 18 of the United States Code. It specifically seeks to repeal prohibitions related to freedom of access to clinic entrances, effectively removing legal restrictions. The bill also includes clerical amendments and clarifies the applicability of the repeal to existing and future prosecutions.
